About Albanos Villa Restaurant Albanos Villa Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1612 Franklin St in Michigan City, IN . Albanos Villa Restaurant has been described as an Amazing Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 9 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Take Out, Pizza Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
